head.title: One Year. Fresh Arrivals. New York.

hedline.hl1: One Year. Fresh Arrivals. New York.

abstract.p: Displaced New Yorker Sean Wright letter lauds September 17 special issue about experiences of new New Yorkers; photo (S)

block.p: I applaud your special issue describing the experiences of people who have moved to New York City (Sept. 17). Your writers did an excellent job of capturing the allure of the city as well as its pitfalls.

I'm a displaced New Yorker myself (currently living in Arizona), but I long for the day when I return. I'm thinking perhaps I need to move back soon. When I find myself feeling envious of a homeless runaway just because he's homeless in New York City, it's time to kiss the desert goodbye.
